values:
So, I am totally in love with my new job, and christmas is around the corner.
Ray is going to look into joining the army. Dad said that he thinks that they are taking GED's right now, and that if ray goes to school just so he can join the air force, he still may be too old to get in, because he is 2 months shy of 25 as it is.
being an army wife wouldnt be so bad, except that they are recruting people to be on the front lines in the middle east. I would always worry, but we'd be married before then, and happily stationed somewhere.
I hope that they are accepting GED's. he seems excited about it.
<3

So, I am beginning to get desperate.
I was shot down by Geico today. That royally sucked.
I even applied at Monkey Joes {{which is an indoor inflatable playground}}.
Today I will be dropping off my applications at Belles & Beaus and at Eagle Springs.
Hopefully one of them will hire me.

:::::EDIT:::::
Hahahahahahaha!!
I got a job at one of the gas stations.
They totally loved the way I presented myself yesterday when I came in to get an application, so the manager told her supervisor, and he said, "well, tell her she's got the job."
YAY!!

So, how unfair is it that the day {{yesterday}} that I return to work after HAVING SURGERY , my boss suddenly decides to up and fire me? She said that I was, "not following protocal" because I didnt report a teacher for something, but I did, and my boss said that the teacher would never do something like that and that she didnt believe me. She also said that I wasnt carrying out my duties at work. 

 My favorite thing she said was, "Do you even change diapers? I have never once seen you change a diaper!" When just last week she complemented me on how quickly I can change a diaper, as if it was a skill or something.

 Then, she calls me tonight telling me that "a parent approached" her and said that they were upset that I was gone. She said that I had contacted them, which, duh, I did, because we are also friends, and that it was illegal for me to talk to "her parents". Fuck that. I will talk to WHOEVER I want to. I am twenty years old and I have all of the same rights that she does.

 So, if the next time she calls, will I be out of line telling her that she can take it up with my lawyers? Because calling me AFTER she has fired me to bitch me out is basically harassment.

I am so sick and tired of feeling like I scum.
I hate that I feel like no one actually gives a crap about me. I feel like nothing I do is ever good enough for my parents.
I hate this.
Maybe I'm just being stupid, but I feel like all I do is go to work and come home to a dirty house that I have to clean, and then I get to listen to my dad say, "Why doesnt anyone ever lift a Fucking finger to clean up this dump?!"
EXCUSE ME??
I did YOUR dishes, and I vacuumed and cleaned the living room and bathroom. Not to mention cleaning my room and filling up the dogs water jug, and making sure that YOUR children get up and get ready for school.
I already have a job that requires me to be on my feet all day and requires me to vacuum and clean bathrooms and tables and sweep and mop, on top of changing diapers, wiping runny noses, dealing with biters and kids that hit and scream instead of using words.
Ugg.
I guess that I am just feeling unappreciated.
When I start college, its only going to get worse, I have a feeling.
</3

So, the doctors think that there is one of three {{if not all three}} things wrong with me.

1.Stomach Ulcer{{s}}
2.My Galbladder
3.Irritable Bowel Syndrome.

So now I have to go in for a series of tests to find out EXACTLY what it is.....sounds like fun huh?
Not remotely.

I'm so over my fucked up body.

Stupid power supply was bad...now we have to exchange it for a new one and hope that it works.
The other parts of the computer work just fine though.
HORRAY!

Ray is building us a computer....and I GET TO HAVE ALL THE SIMS GAMES THAT I WANT!!!
Haha...I know that it may sound lame, but it really is exciting for me...
I am going to get Double Deluxe, Apartment Life, Seasons, and Freetime {{may add Bon Voyage later on}}....and I am also getting the Glamour Stuff pack and the H&M Fashion Stuff pack.
I am so excited.
We will be getting the parts for the computer in a few weeks and then it will take a few days to put together, but after that....

Stuff. Stuff. Stuff. is going on here.
Lets see.
1. I might possibly be diabetic. If not, then no one knows what is wrong with me.
2. Kathryn was ALMOST evacuated and was going to come here. She wasnt evacuated, but maybe she will come visit sometime in the near future.
3. I had to spend $321.00 on new tires and an alignment for my car.
4. I havent seen any of my friends in weeks.
5. Work is good.
6. I will be going to Kentucky in December for a week.

Yeah.
<3

Learning a life lesson is definitely tough.
And I will never make that mistake again.
a few hours of fun is soooooo not worth that sort of chaos.
I love my friends, but I love Ray too.
With all my heart.
I want to spend the rest of my life with him, and I was sure to let him know that.
<3
Oh, and hot sex on a Sunday night can be reeeeaaaallllyyyy fun.

Unfortunately, we had the sad duty of putting Penny down Monday.


She had been throwing up a lot, and she had lost a lot of weight. He breathing was labored, and she just wasnt acting right.


We took her to the vet and he ran some tests. He said that she had diabetes, and that he blood/sugar levels were over 500!!!! He liver was failing, and at her age, it would have been pointless to give her insulin shots. He said that he would do it, but she would still die within the next few months, and they would have been brutal for her.


So we had her put down.


Its terrible. I look around the house and she isnt there.


:(

I have seriously NOT been all that impressed at work lately. LaJean is driving me CRAZY because shes in a bad f*cking mood. ITS NOT MY FUCKING FAULT THAT YOU ARENT GETTING ANY!!! TALK TO YOUR HUSBAND ABOUT THAT!!!! My sex life is just fine, thank you.
What makes it so bad is that I work at a daycare, and LJ's bad mood puts me in a bad mood, which puts all the kids into CRAZY mode and makes it that much harder to do my job.
Maybe it will be better after my weekend in Valdosta. Who knows.
Shopping, my boyfriend, my friends, and being 2 1/2 hours away from my job and my family.
Its going to be amazing....

On the bright side, I went to the gym today and got a few looks. Haha. I dunno if it was good or not.
Oh, and here is something fun.

Whoohoo!!!
Going to Valdosta in 2 weeks!!!
Yup!!!

So, Ray was getting better after having pneumonia, but it looks like he is getting a little bit sick again.
I guess that we will have to see.
<3

Ray is sick.
Ray has been sick.
Ray hasnt gone to work since Tuesday.
So, tonight I will be taking him to the med-stop.
His fever is 102.1.
But he wants mom to go with us.
Apparently, I am an incompotant retard who doesnt know what it is like to go to the doctor.
"Well, I just want her to go in case there is something we cant handle."
Um, are we dumb?
I think we can answer questions on our own.
I am trying to show him how much I love him and how well I can take care of him, but he wants my mom.
I know that he really didnt have much of a mom growing up, but it really hurts my feelings.
Maybe its just because he doesnt ever get sick like this.
We'll go with that.
<3

HORRAY FOR HERO KATHRYN!!!
<3
Things are gooooooooooood.

So, life is ....retarded...
But still good.
I'm in love and happy.
But I hate living at home.
Ray will be signing up for school soon, and that means that we will be one step closer to being married and military.
Woot.

MERRY CHRISTMAS!!!
I hope that this Christmas was good for everyone that I know and love.
<3

I deleted my facebook.
Sorry.
I never use it anyway.

Gahh!!
I'm home sick.
And I must have sounded bad when I called Mrs. Liz this morning because she had Mrs. Michelle {{my boss}} call me to see if how I was feeling and if I needed tomorrow off too.
She went ahead and gave me tomorrow off.
That woman is fantastic.
I love my job.
<3

I hate that I havent been able to see some of my friends for a while.
But at the same time, I am tired of trying to make plans and then getting my feet kicked out from under me because apparently the plans werent good enough.
Blahh.
And no, this isnt meant to create drama, and I'm not mad at anyone.
I'm just a little sad that no one ever seems to want to hang out with me anymore.

Does anyone know if Kathrynanne and Chad got married yesterday?
I know that they were planning on it, but did it actually happen?
I hope so.
<3

Finally, I am going to have some real money. 
Starting tomorrow, I am going to be working 8-5:30 every day for the next 2 weeks.
I really need this.
I need to talk to Mrs. Liz too.
I need to be full-time.
But still,  thats $400 dollars in my bank account. I could give Ray $200 to put into savings and still be all set for the two weeks until my next pay check.
AWSOME!!!
That is, if Rachelle is actually going to be gone all those days.

What Disney Princess Are You?


Cinderella;
[] One of your parents is dead
[] You are expected to do a lot of chores
[] You love to dress up
[X] You love animals
[] You are waiting patiently for your Prince Charming
[] Your mom is really strict
[] You have sisters who seem kind of jealous of you
[] You're afraid to speak your mind sometimes
[X] You have left your shoes at a friend's house before
[] You have blonde hair
TOTAL: 2

Belle;
[X] You've fallen for someone your friends didn't like
[] You've been lost in the forest
[X] You love to read
[] You are not shy at all, and not afraid to speak your mind
[X] One of your family members is a bit wierd
[X] You have done volunteer work
[x] You have a wild imagination
[X] You love to take care of people in need
[x] You've had guys like you only because they think you're pretty
[X] You've rejected at least one person when they've asked you out
TOTAL: 8

Jasmine;
[] Your dad is very rich/important
[X] You are very clever
[X] You've fallen in love with someone way different from you
[X] You're unique and different from everyone else
[X] You'd never marry someone just because they were rich
[] You have set a lot of goals for yourself
[X] You don't have a lot of friends
[X] You're independant
[x] You have a very nice house
[] Your parents try to control your life
TOTAL: 7

Ariel;
[X] Your parents expect a lot from you
[] You really try to follow the rules, but it's hard for you
[] You're a bit of a trouble maker
[] You're the youngest in your family
[] You have a lot of sisters
[] You collect something
[] You have long, red hair
[X] You have a pet fish
[] You're extremely curious
[] You believe everything people tell you/you're a bit gullible
TOTAL: 2

Snow White;
[] You know that you're beautiful
[] Sometimes it seems like your mom is jealous of you
[x] You've almost been killed
[] You have at least seven good friends
[] You've had food poisoning
[x]You have short brown hair
[X] You get along with everyone
[X] All of your friends are different
[X] You love to have a good time
[X] You're happier when you're out of the house than in
TOTAL: 6

Mulan;
[] You're a tomboy
[] Everyone wishes you could be a bit more girly
[] You've pretended to be someone you're not
[] You've had a physical fight with someone
[X] You have/had considered running away from home
[] Your parents try to plan your life out
[] Most of your friends are boys
[] You sometimes find yourself in bad situations
[X] You love your family so much that you'd do anything to protect them
[X] You are proud that you're different
TOTAL: 3

Aurora (Sleeping Beauty);
[] You live with someone other than your parents
[x] You were almost killed at a very young age
[X] You are gentle, loving, and/or thoughtful
[x] You have a beautiful voice {{or so i've heard}}
[X] You like to sleep in late on the weekends
[] You spend most of your time outside
[] You're adopted
[] You have long hair
[x] You're very romantic
[} Pink is one of your favorite colors
TOTAL: 5

Pocahontas;
[X] You love to walk around and explore your city/town
[x] You are more spiritual than religious
[] You've been in an interracial relationship
[] One of your siblings is dead
[] Your parents are very protective of you
[X] Someone you know has been in war
[X] You love nature
[] You have black hair 
[X] You would love to move somewhere exotic and beautiful
[] You're very adventurous
TOTAL: 4

Saturday night was quite a good one. 
First, Ray and I ate cheesy-fries at like 4 pm.
Then, at 7:30, I had my parents take my brothers out to dinner and a movie so that Ray and I could have some time to ourselves. I cooked him dinner (a chicken and pasta dish) and we watched a movie.
While I was cooking dinner, Ray moved the little table into the living room. He set it, and lit some candles, then he turned off the light when it was time to eat. He poured my drink and everything. It was wonderful.
After dinner, we watched Thr3e...which definitely wasnt as good as the book, but still ok. 
But yeah, it was a great evening, and I'm sure we will do it again.
:)

I got to see Amber the other day!
Woooot!
Now I know where she lives...
Its a good thing Ray went with me....I cant navigate for crap.

I was just reading some old posts from other people.
Do all my friends HATE my boyfriend?
And if you do, then why?
What has he ever done to any of you?
Yes, I realize that he's probably not the nicest person in the world to my sister, but he's good to me, and shouldnt that be what matters?
If everyone has a problem with him, then why continue to hang out with me?
You all know that chances are I will want Ray to go, or I will say something about him.
So why?

Something is weighing very heavily on my heart tonight.

I decided to accompany my brother to youth group at our church tonight.
Well, I got there and I was sitting down and I see another youth member walk in. She didnt look like she was exactly in the happiest mood. I was going to give her a hug and tell her hi, but before I even got the chance, a boy in our youth started to just let her have it. He was saying all sorts of mean things. Telling her that such-and-such church was the other way and telling her to make a choice about which church she wants to go to and telling her not to be coming into the youth room acting like the devil.
I was completely HORRIFIED. I couldnt believe that he could be so cruel to her. It got so bad that she left. She couldnt even be there because of the harassment that was being thrown her way.
I expressed my concerns to an older adult in the youth room and called the youth member as soon as I got home. We talked for a few minutes and I let her know that I'm always here if she needs to talk and that I am praying for her and that I love her.

I just cant believe that something like that would happen. I wish that it hadnt. I now see what non-christians mean when they say that christians can be twisted. I'm sorry to admit that maybe some are, but most are not.....those that are have just lost thier way, and they need prayer and guidence.

I am going to pray for this girl and this boy...and for my youth...I ask that you do the same. You may not know who they are, but you can still pray.

So, I dont ever use this thing anymore.
I should.
Work sucks.
I hate it.
But whatever.
I'm going to get a job at a better daycare.
I just need to complete one MAJOR test first....
And then....
We'll see.
I'm quitting my job at the church.
I'm tired of the bullshit.
CONGRATS to Amber and John who got married on Saturday.
I am keeping you in my prayers.
Ray and I are doing WONDERFUL.
I love him so much.
Love.
Seriously.
Love.
Love is nice.
^__^
Other things are nice too....
Like flowers.
And kisses.
And laying in bed with the man you love.
Absolutely.
Oh, my new favorite thing to do is to lay in bed with Ray and watch stupid movies that we've seen a million times.
its the best.
100%
<3
I'm done.

So, I'm crying right now. How lame am I? I had a really descent day and then, tonight, after a wonderful youth service, it all fell to crap.

I went out driving with Amber today. Just a little refresher course before my test on Friday. God was truely looking out for me after that. Danah wanted me to fill in for her tonight, and I had my heart set on going to youth, but God had me in his hands. Ashley showed up to work when she wasnt scheduled, so I was able to go to youth.

Well, after the service, the devil decided to play with me. I went down to the nursery to apologize for not being there on Sunday night for the meeting {{I was throwing up like crazy}}. Well, my boss proceeded to lecture me on the "importance of always being on time for meetings and always being at work when i'm scheduled". Um, I've never missed a SINGLE day of work that I have not found a replacement for, and as for the meeting, well, excuse me for being sick. I stayed as nice as I could when I explained all this to my boss, but then she got mad at me b/c on Sunday morning I signed out at 12:30 when I was done at 12:20.....I looked at my mom's watch to see the time, not knowing that it is 10 minutes ahead. I explained that to her as well, and changed the time on my card to say 12:20. She continued to lecture me some more after I asked her if I could have Easter Sunday off {{which she said I ABSOLUTELY could NOT...even though I was sick last year and missed the service}}, and then I finally said, "My ride is waiting. I really have to go." 

Then I came home, and I was really upset, but I didnt show it, oh no. I'm not one to wear my emotions on my sleeve....I'm really not....I hate it when people say, "whats wrong? why are you upset?" b/c I hate explaining things, so I just dont show that I'm upset....but tonight, after Ray got up to let his dog out, his phone alarm went off. I turned it off and saw that a picture of his FUCKING DOG is his wallpaper. Do you know what my wallpaper is? Him. A picture of Ray is what I see everytime I use my phone. That way, he knows I think about him...but no....his wallpaper is his damn dog. I know that it really shouldnt bother me...its stupid and petty, and normally, something like that wouldnt, but his dog always comes first no matter what. Here is the order of importance {{as I see it}} in Ray's world.

1. Dog
2. Computer
3. My mom {{he talks to her about everything....and me....nothing}}
4. Me

Seriously....I feel like I am the least important thing in his life. I want to talk to him about it, but I know that he will just dismiss it or something. I practically have to beg him to spend time with me sometimes....and that hurts me....and I do, I so do want to talk to him....but its hard for me to find the right words and to use a tone that doesnt sound confrontational or something.
I know he knows something is wrong, because he asked me before he went to bed if there was....and I stupidly just said, "I'm fine" even though I'm literally DYING on the inside.

I dunno...

Maybe I'm just being stupid.

Maybe I have just had a bad night and need to go to bed.

Let me just start off by saying that my last entry had NOTHING to do with the people that commented on it. It was a totally unrelated subject...and, if you had just ASKED me, I would have told you about it.

Now, I understand that you are all pissed off at me, but you know what, I said my piece, I'm done with it now, and what was bothering me no longer is. But see, there is something else that is bugging me now. People, who I thought liked me, at least a little, have let something escalate and are now pissed at me...well, thats all fine and dandy, because if friendships are ruined over something so FUCKING trivial, then they werent really friendships in the first damn place, now were they? I dont want that.

Ok, now that I am done acting like a retarded 10th grader, perhaps you guys are too, we can put this whole thing behind us.
Sound like a plan {{or are you all going to hate me forever?}}

<3

So, drama is lame.
I am soooo sick of people SEACHING for things to fight about.
Its so rediculous.
Why do it?
Is it for some sort of gratification?
Do you get some sort of perverse pleasure out of it?
Just curious.
Gahh.
{{Dont worry, thats not just for one set of people...}}
{{In fact, its sort of for the whole world}}
<3

So, this is my first entry since December 6th. WOW.
Um...not to much has happened.
Amber is getting married here soon. YAY!!!
Ray and I are into our 7th month of dating. OH YEAH!!!
High School Drama cant be left at the high school.
Oh, and I LOVE YOU!!
<3
RIP MoJo 7/29/05 - 9/28/06

Crank is a really, really good movie.

I've been reading up on some xangas/myspaces/livejournals and I've come to the realization that I would die if I wasnt planning on living at home during the first year of college.
Everyone that I know that is not living at home is having so many problems.

I am also relieved that I'm applying for that job at my church. I think that if I worked in an enviornment where I had to help rude people that I dont know, I would end up either A)getting fired or B)killing someone.

Yes....
Thats all.

<33 Melissa

Oh, and even though none of you really seem all that interested, Ray and I are doing fantastic. =D

Went to the movies last night with Ray, Don, John F., Sam H., and some girl named Jenny.
We went to see The Covenant. It was pretty decent.
That Jenny girl pissed me off. She was being really rude to Ray and she was being a bitch at Coldstone.
Thank God she went home.
After the movie/coldstone, we went to John's house. 
I didnt know he lives down the street from me.
The boys played Halo and I talked to John's little sister.
She's pretty cool.
Ray said that I seemed different last night. Like I had something on my mind.
Hmm...
I didnt.
I dunno....I was tired, so thats probably it.

<33 Melissa

I am soooooo tired right now.

Ray and I went on our first official date today.
We went to see "The Wicker Man".
It was a decent movie.
After that we walked around the mall for a while.
We played in the dollar store for quite some time.
Back to my house at 4:00.
We watched Nanny McPhee and then ate dinner.
Then we watched Mr. & Mrs. Smith.
Then we went into my room to watch The Princess Diaries.
I had my eyes closed for most of the movie b/c I'm so tired.
After the movie, we started watching Dark Angel on sifi.....
but then we got distracted....by our mouths....lol.
He left at 11:15.
:(
It was a fun evening.

<33 Melissa

So, it's pretty much OFFICIAL now. =D
HECK YESSSSSS!!!!

I'm back from Connecticut finally.

He came to the airport last night to pick me up. I looked for him first after I got my bag. I didnt even look for my dad or my sister until I saw him. 
We (Maddie and Robert included) goofed around at Arby's and then Ray and I held hands on the way home. When we hugged good night, neither one of us wanted to let go.
My feelings for him are genuine. I can be me around him, and I love that.

<33 Melissa

Its been a little while. 
So, me and Ray are doing good. We still havent become "official" yet, but we are going to talk about me giving up my Pirate life when I get back, because Pirates and Ninja's cant date.....yeah, its strange, but its cute too.

I'll be home VERY late on Saturday night.
I will get to sleep in my own bed.
w00t!!

<3 Melissa

Trappednwndrland: i feel like i'm fork retarded 
Ray: Bad food, get back on that fork! grr 

..... about 1 minute later  .....

Trappednwndrland: i've decided that i am never going to eat spaghetti in front of you b/c i'm fork retarded 
Ray: You can't do that, what If we end up being together, for a really long time?
Trappednwndrland: hmm....i'm either gonna have to master eating spaghetti with a fork or you're just not gonna be allowed to look at me when i eat it.... 
Ray: lol

Ray: lol
Ray: you dont need a knife for that lol

Ray: poor noddles.. :(
Trappednwndrland: technically i'm not hurting them...i'm multiplying them
Trappednwndrland: haha...i like the way i think
Ray: hahaha
Ray: your silly

I'm pretty much on top of the world right now....
Yet I still dont know where we stand....
But I know that he likes me, and right now, that's all I need.

<33 Melissa

P.S...
I'm about to leave for CT. 
I'll be gone until the 26th...
I sure hope he's waiting when I get back...
I know he will be...he promised.

Me: Don't go finding someone better while I'm gone, ok?
Him: I'll still be here when you get back.

because of my 3 brothers not being able to follow rules, jacob got hit in the eye by jarod with a stick...and now he cant see out of his left eye...

dad said that there is a chance that he could be blind for good.

pray for him..


::::::::::EDIT::::::::::

he can see...thank God.

so, i love how my parents came home from winn-dixie pissed off. neither one of them was speaking to the other, and i made the dumb mistake of asking my mom if it was too late to vacuum, seeing as how my brothers have yet to fall asleep. she may as well have cut my head of with a dull razor. she got sooooooo mad at me. i'm not going to lie to you, it made me cry. i cleaned this entire fucking house tonight ALONE, and all my mom can do is get mad at me.

i think that they had another fight about money. i need to get in touch with Master Sergent Sims or whoever and ask about that Appointment Clerk job on the base, so that they dont have to deal with my selfish ass asking for things. i feel like i asked for too much last night at wal-mart. all i got a pair of shorts and some flip-flops. maybe i should return them.

i hate this.

</33 melissa

as i go through and read blogs and as i sit and listen to my friends tell me thier "problems" i find myself wondering why they are bitching and why i am sitting there letting them.

think about it. if you have parents who are willing to feed and cloth you, make you go to school, let you hang out with your friends, and raise you with care, shouldnt that be enough to prove that they love you? why do we feel the need to have our parents prove their love by giving us all their money, buying us only the "best" clothes, letting us walk all over them, and then basically letting us spit in thier faces?

take my sister for instance. she is pissed because my parents dont like her boyfriend. they are saying that she has changed since they started dating. it has NOTHING to do with the fact that he isnt a Christian, and everything to do with the fact that since they have started dating, she has been selfish, rude, uncooperative, mean, ditching her friends, ditching me, standoffish, etc. she doesnt see it. she lets her boyfriend walk all over her, and she lets him make fun of my brothers. he picks on my brother with mental disabilities more than anything and she just sits there and lets it happen. she, of course, does not see it that way, but everyone else does, even her best friend.

mom and dad are trying to look out for her. they dont want her getting hurt later on by this stuff. but she doesnt care. she just wants them there to take her over to "his" house, buy her clothes, pay for the crap she wants to buy at the mall, and then leave her the hell alone.

it shouldnt work that way.

you know, i used to think that my dad was the source of all my problems. i used to think that he was the reason that i was cutting myself, because everytime i cut myself REALLY badly, it was after a fight i had with him. i used to blame him for everything. i have very resently realized that my problems were not my dad's fault, they were mine. well, actually, they were the mental illness....but thats another blog entirely.

anyway, one night, about 6 months into my senior year, after i had cut my foot to, basically, hamburger meat, i looked at myself in my bedroom mirror. i was contemplating what my next move was going to be. more cutting? suicide? i saw the mascara running down my face and the blood soaking through the ace bandage. i saw the razor in my hand and the fear in my eyes. for the first time since the 7th grade (that is when i began to cut), i could feel the pain that the razor had caused. the physical pain of the gashes on my foot. i knew that i had to stop, that cutting or suicide were not going to help me at all, so i took the razor, broke it in half, and threw it in the trash.

i looked at myself again, and told myself that the problem wasnt with my dad, it was with me. dad had been my scapegoat since the 7th grade, and he didnt deserve that. i didnt deserve that kind of pain either, so i made it my life goal to never get myself down to that point ever again. things are slowly becoming better.

so, i guess that what i am trying to say is, dont get pissed off if your parents want to know where you are and who you are with. dont get mad if you cant go to Holister or American Eagle to buy a $35 dollar shirt. your parents are trying. most of them want the best for their children, but sometimes the best comes with a budget. sometimes the best is a shopping spree at TJ Maxx and $20 to go to the movies. your parents love you and they are trying, so give them a break every now and then. a hug and saying, "i love you mom. thanks for everything." might be just what the doctor ordered. 

-Dr. Melissa

Oh my goodness!!!! ServeMG is awesome!!! I want to go back to Mississippi now!!! =)

Here's what we did...

We went to Gulfport to help Katrina victims rebuild their houses. We were put in groups (not by church) and we worked on a house for 5 days.

I had so much fun with my WONDERFUL group (Wanda, Richard, Jake, Emily, Kara, Kristen, Braden, Patrick, Lyndsey, and Daniel) I love those guys so much

On our way to Gulfport we passed by the Mississippi sign and saw Kara's church standing in front of it. We pretty much thought that they were insane...espacially since it was about to pour down rain.

We had worship that night and we also found out there was NO hot water, and 12 showers (8 being communial, however you spell that). The next day we had pictures and went to our worksite. We were told we might not have anyone from our church group in our group...which happened, but thats ok, because i had Kara. The lady that we were rebuilding the house for was a VERY GODLY woman, her name was Miss Annie, I LOVE her to death.

We had the same schedule about everyday exept Wedsday, we got group free time, that was fun. Our youth group went to Covington, Louisiana (which was 2 hours away) and ate at this AMAZING seafood place. Seeing as how I dont like seafood, I got a turkey club. It was yummy. The we went to Wal-Mart and bought some food for the room.

Thursday we got Miss Annie something and got pictures developed and had the same old same old. I failed to tell about the nasty peanut butter and jelly sandwitchs from wendsday YUCK ...our group got double cheesebugers instead.  

Friday was amazing but yet sad  it was our last day. Miss Annie took us out to Pizza Hut to eat. By that time our goup was really close. We stopped by a yard sale and met a lady named Brenda who was very sweet and kind she showed us where she lived and stuff, she had her FEMA trailer fixed up. We then went to Dollar Genral and a trift store, and we went to the Armory....where the NC Baptist men were staying.  Miss Annie gave us a tile off her floor with a message to each of us and a thank you card. She cried as we pulled off, and I cried after I got back to the school. Inside the thank you card she put $10. We were there to help her, so why did she do that. Out of LOVE thats what I think, but she still did not have to do that. 

Friday night, AJ, Brodo, Terry, Carrie, Kathryn D., and I went to the beach. it was soooooooo sad. there were clothes and stuff imbedded in the water. As Kathryn and I were walking in the sand, i saw this blue thing. I dug it up, and it was a little plastic carebear cup. I can't even imagine what happened to the little girl that had owned that cup.

Thats about it. We picked on AJ a bit...and none of the people that went with our group likes Kathryn D. very much. She's extremely irritating. But we had a really good time...and I would do it again in a Heartbeat.

<33 Melissa
